QuestData.Title: Stop the Inquisition
QuestData.Description:
The Lord Chamberlain's inquisitors still torment the poor souls trapped under their care.
You must put a stop to their wicked deeds!
Speak with Archivist Fane, whom you worked with before to defeat an inquisitor, to acquire the sinstone of another inquisitor in the halls.
With their sinstone, you will be able to shatter that inquisitor's defenses and lead the charge to defeat them.
Bring friends, $p. Many of the inquisitors are far too dangerous to approach alone.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Defeat any inquisitor in Halls of Atonement.
Archivist Fane can provide Inquisitor Sinstones to help you in your hunt.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Archivist Janeera in Halls of Atonement.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Archivist Janeera does not look up from her scroll as she responds to you.>
Noted and logged.
